user_question: Can you suggest a yoga routine for improving flexibility and generate an image of a person doing yoga in a serene environment?
final_answer: Suggested yoga routine for flexibility: 1) Cat-Cow Pose: Alternating between arching and rounding the back. 2) Downward-Facing Dog: Forming an inverted V-shape with the body. 3) Standing Forward Bend: Bending forward from the hips. 4) Triangle Pose: Extending arms and legs in a triangle shape. 5) Seated Forward Bend: Sitting and reaching forward over legs. Image of a person doing yoga in a serene environment generated.
